price: Onlar, bir mucize görseler yüz çevirirler ve; “Süregelen bir sihirdir.” derler.
arabic: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ ءَايَةٗ يُعۡرِضُواْ وَيَقُولُواْ سِحۡرٞ مُّسۡتَمِرّٞ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yaraw āyatan yuʿ'riḍū wayaqūlū siḥ'run mus'tamirrun
